es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adaptation
Class AdaptedState

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adaptation.AdaptedState
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasTargetId, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdaptationObjetive
public class AdaptedState
extends Object
implements Cloneable, HasTargetId

Stores the adaptation data, which includes the flag activation and deactivation values, along with the initial scene of the game

change

public void change(int index,
                   String name)
Change the type of "index" position. If in that position there was a flag, change it to var and vice versa. It change and set the new flag or var to default value.

Parameters:
index - the position where the change will take place
name - the name of the new flag or var

merge

public void merge(AdaptedState mergeState)
Joins two Adapted States. The new resulting adapted state has a merge of active/inactive flags of both states, and the initial scene will be set as the initial scene of the parameter state. With the vars, its do the same action. The new flags/vars will be add at the end of the data structure;

Parameters:
AdaptedState - mergeState The state which will be merged with the current object

isFlag

public boolean isFlag(int index)
Check if the value in the given position is flag or variable.

Parameters:
index - the position in allFlagsVar
Returns:
true if the value in the given position has "flag" value.

isFlag

Returns:
true, if name is flag
